<MethodEndpoint

Retrieves a paginated list of all functions in the workspace with their basic information and current status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"count","in":"query","description":"Number of items to be returned in each page.","schema":{"type":"number","description":"Number of items to be returned in each page."}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"Page number to retrieve, starting from 1.","schema":{"type":"number","description":"Page number to retrieve, starting from 1."}},{"name":"all","in":"query","description":"If true, returns all requested items, ignoring pagination parameters page and count.","schema":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, returns all requested items, ignoring pagination parameters page and count."}},{"name":"function_type","in":"query","style":"form","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["VALUE_VALIDATION","VALUE_COMPUTE","CONTEXT_VALIDATION","CHANGE_REASON_VALIDATION"],"title":"FunctionTypes"}},"explode":true},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-workspace","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
